title: Just got a skin that I already own from Poro King Box
body: Basically title, opened up Poro King Box, got Snowstorm Sivir, should this happen? Fell like I got robbed from.

replies.body:
>What’s in a Poro King’s Treasure Chest?

>**The Poro King’s Treasure Chest contains a random Skin Permanent**. You’ll need three Poro King Treasure Chest fragments, which can drop from Winter and Snowdown Chests, to craft this.

From the Snowdown 2016 FAQ, under the "CRAFTING"-tab.


http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016

The permanent found in the Poro King Chest is random, so it's possible to receive something you already have unlocked.  The item can be disenchanted though, and essences used towards a shard.  I hope that helps!

I for one won't push my luck any more with these Snowdown chests...got Red Baron Corki and Omega Squad Teemo in the 2 Poro King's Chests - both legendaries I did not previously own. ^^

Btw, there is a bug with the Snowdown chests: bought a "Braum's Little Helpers"-chest yesterday, but opened it today. 
I got Program Soraka, a skin I am pretty sure wasn't on yesterday's list.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/236357867

Any place we can see previous offers to make sure?
